title: GMOs and the Farm Bill
content:
News Update & Call to Action:Â  pro-GMO riders attached to the Farm Bill and Agriculture Appropriations Bill Nandini... <!--more--> Gopinadh is the Legislative and Policy Analyst for the Alliance for Natural Health an international organization in Washington DC dedicated to promoting sustainable health, health freedom choice, and protection to natural health care practitioners through good science and law.
Aside from her lifelong involvement in natural health and healing, Nandini has a Masters in Public Administration from the School of International and Public Affairs at Columbia University and has formerly worked on human rights and health policies on both the state and federal levels.
www.ANH-USA.org
